title: Average YouTube video length 2018 , by category
summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
The highest Youtube Category Gaming has 17.9 more Average length in minutes than the lowest Youtube Category Music.
min_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
Youtube Category Gaming has the highest Average length in minutes and Music has the lowest Average length in minutes.
mid_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The Average length in minutes is appeared to be the highest at Youtube Category Gaming and lowest at Youtube Category Music.
The highest Youtube Category Gaming has 17.9 more Average length in minutes than the lowest Youtube Category Music.
max_summary: This bar chart has 7 columns on the x axis representing Youtube Category, and Average length in minutes in each Youtube Category on the y axis.
The maximum Average length in minutes 24.7 is found at Youtube Category Gaming and the minimum is found at Music where Youtube Category is 6.8.
The difference of Average length in minutes between the highest and lowest Youtube Category is 17.9.
The Youtube Category Gaming has the highest Average length in minutes, followed by Film and animation, and Entertainment. Down to the Youtube Category Music which is the lowest.
The Youtube Category Music has 1.86 times less Average length in minutes than average.
Summing up the values of all Youtube Categorys, we get total 93.2.
